word:
Go Not to Human Agencies. 

                                      Sanitarium, Cal., Oct. 3, 1907. 

Elder Reaser, 
     257 South Hill Street 
     Los Angeles, Cal. 

My Brother:-- 
     I have read your letters, but can not possibly answer them fully now. You would misunderstand me if I should write. If I attend the Los Angeles meeting, I can then communicate to you and to others. I have much to say. Until then make no decided moves.
